titles: A greatter thanks, for Churchyardes welcome home
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publisher: In little Britaine by Alexander Lacy: for Arthour Pepwel, dwellyng in Paules churchyard, at the signe of the Kynges head,
notes: Signed: (q[uod]) playne Churchyarde, i.e. Thomas Churchyard.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
